[Home](./index.md) &gt; [onespan-sign-node](./onespan-sign-node.md) &gt; [Api](./onespan-sign-node.api.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./onespan-sign-node.api._constructor_.md)

## Api.(constructor)

Constructs an instance of the `Api` class.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(apiKey: string, apiUrl: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  apiKey | string | API key to interact with OneSpan Sign's API. This value is added to the <code>authorization</code> header at every request. |
|  apiUrl | string | Url for the OneSpan Sign API server. This is the base URL for every request. |

## Remarks

- For information on how to retrieve your API key, see [Integration (OneSpan)](https://community.onespan.com/documentation/onespan-sign/guides/admin-guides/user/integration)<!-- -->.

- A list of server URLs can be found at [Environment URLs &amp; IP Addresses (OneSpan)](https://community.onespan.com/documentation/onespan-sign/guides/quick-start-guides/developer/environment-urls-ip-addresses)<!-- -->.
